Package org.bouncycastle.jce

Class PKCS10CertificationRequest

java.lang.Object
org.bouncycastle.bcasn1.ASN1Object
org.bouncycastle.bcasn1.pkcs.CertificationRequest
org.bouncycastle.jce.PKCS10CertificationRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bouncycastle.bcasn1.ASN1Encodable, org.bouncycastle.bcutil.Encodable
public class PKCS10CertificationRequest
extends org.bouncycastle.bcasn1.pkcs.CertificationRequest
Deprecated.
use classes in org.bouncycastle.pkcs.
A class for verifying and creating PKCS10 Certification requests. 
 CertificationRequest ::= SEQUENCE {
   certificationRequestInfo  CertificationRequestInfo,
   signatureAlgorithm        AlgorithmIdentifier{{ SignatureAlgorithms }},
   signature                 BIT STRING
 }

 CertificationRequestInfo ::= SEQUENCE {
   version             INTEGER { v1(0) } (v1,...),
   subject             Name,
   subjectPKInfo   SubjectPublicKeyInfo{{ PKInfoAlgorithms }},
   attributes          [0] Attributes{{ CRIAttributes }}
  }

  Attributes { ATTRIBUTE:IOSet } ::= SET OF Attribute{{ IOSet }}

  Attribute { ATTRIBUTE:IOSet } ::= SEQUENCE {
    type    ATTRIBUTE.&id({IOSet}),
    values  SET SIZE(1..MAX) OF ATTRIBUTE.&Type({IOSet}{\@type})
  }
